SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT A.NO ,PER.NAME AS PERMISSION ,PO.NAME AS POSITION ,A.ID ,A.PWD ,A.NICK ,A.NAME ,A.PHONE ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.MODIFY_DATE ,DECODE(QUIT_YN, 'N','유지', 'Y','탈퇴') AS QUIT_YN FROM ADMIN A JOIN ADMIN_PERMISSION PER ON A.PERMISSION = PER.NO JOIN ADMIN_POSITION PO ON A.POSITION = PO.NO
WHERE A.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY A.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT NO ,PERMISSION ,POSITION ,ID ,NICK ,NAME ,PHONE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,QUIT_YN ,PROFILE_NAME FROM ADMIN WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT A.NO ,PER.NAME AS PERMISSION ,PO.NAME AS POSITION ,A.ID ,A.PWD ,A.NICK ,A.NAME ,A.PHONE ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.MODIFY_DATE ,A.QUIT_YN ,A.PROFILE_NAME FROM ADMIN A JOIN ADMIN_PERMISSION PER ON A.PERMISSION = PER.NO JOIN ADMIN_POSITION PO ON A.POSITION = PO.NO WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.QUIT_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT NO ,ID ,PWD ,NAME ,BIRTH ,PHONE ,NICK ,EMAIL ,TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,PROFILE_IMG ,POINT ,REPORT_YN ,DECODE(QUIT_YN, 'N','유지', 'Y','탈퇴') AS QUIT_YN FROM MEMBER
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT NO ,ID ,PWD ,NAME ,BIRTH ,PHONE ,NICK ,EMAIL ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,PROFILE_IMG ,POINT ,REPORT_YN ,QUIT_YN FROM MEMBER WHERE NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT P.MEMBER_NO ,CP.NAME AS HISTORY ,P.CHANGE ,P.ENROLL_DATE FROM POINT P JOIN CATE_POINT CP ON P.HISTORY = CP.NO WHERE P.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY P.ENROLL_DATE DESC
